CIRCULAR 11 / 2000 
 
SUB : CARRIAGE OF HAND BAGGAGE BY PASSENGER 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau circular No 06 / 2000 dated 24.02.2000 regarding 
carriage of additional items along with hand baggage by a passenger on board the aircraft, 
Laptop computer is allowed to be carry as an additional item with one hand baggage by a 
passenger on board a civil flight. 
 
 
(VEERANNA AIVELLI) 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-26 (5) / 1994/DIV-I  
Dated : 11.05.2000
